body_html: Cool, glad to know it worked! We made the BFC allocator the default yesterday, so if you sync to head you probably don't need your additional modifications. This will make it into the next binary release. Thanks again!
body_text: Cool, glad to know it worked!  We made the BFC allocator the default yesterday, so if you sync to head you probably don't need your additional modifications.  This will make it into the next binary release.  Thanks again!
body: Cool, glad to know it worked!  We made the BFC allocator the default yesterday, so if you sync to head you probably don't need your additional modifications.  This will make it into the next binary release.  Thanks again!
